known_issues: In mission view, toggling a task's completed checkbox (complete ↔ incomplete) does not update the mission immediately; requires immediate mission refresh/update.

existing_features.title: Fix the Mission view so that toggling a task checkbox (incomplete → complete and complete → incomplete) updates the mission UI immediately, without requiring a manual refresh or waiting for a later mission refetch.

Ensure the task-toggle flow does not depend on stale component state when syncing post-mutation mission/task data (e.g., do not use a stale `selectedMission` reference after `mutateAsync`). After a task toggle completes, any baseline/cache sync must use the latest mission tasks from the React Query cache for that mission so that subsequent autosave behavior cannot overwrite the toggled completion state.

projectName: Make mission task completion toggle update immediately
